scripts.init: cd src1 && npm install && cd .. && cd src2 && npm install && cd .. && cd cdk1 && npm install && cd .. && cd cdk2 && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build1: rm -rf dist1 && mkdir dist1 && cd src1 && tsc && cd .. && cp src1/package.json dist1/package.json && cp src1/package-lock.json dist1/package-lock.json && cd dist1 && npm install --only=prod && cd ..
scripts.build2: rm -rf dist2 && mkdir dist2 && cd src2 && tsc && cd .. && cp src2/package.json dist2/package.json && cp src2/package-lock.json dist2/package-lock.json && cd dist2 && npm install --only=prod && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build1 && npm run build2
scripts.deploy1: cd cdk1 && cdk deploy --outputs-file stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.deploy2: cd cdk2 && cdk deploy --outputs-file stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy1 && npm run deploy2
scripts.destroy: cd cdk2 && cdk destroy && cd .. && cd cdk1 && cdk destroy && cd ..
scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run demo
